title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 536 - State University Of New York At Buffalo
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 536 - State University Of New York At Buffalo

State Regulations
§ 536.1 - Disruption
§ 536.2 - Unauthorized entry
§ 536.3 - Theft and destruction of property
§ 536.4 - Physical abuses and harassment
§ 536.5 - Dangerous weapons and explosives
§ 536.6 - Picketing and demonstrations
§ 536.7 - Loitering and trespassing on university grounds or in the university buildings
§ 536.8 - Sanctions
§ 536.9 to 536.11 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 536

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 355 [2][b], 356, 6450

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
